description: Try our easy to follow Poached Peaches with Passionfruit Toffee recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Poached Peaches with Passionfruit Toffee Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place 2 cups water, sugar and cinnamon in a large heavy-based saucepan. Split vanilla bean and scrape out seeds using the point of a small knife. Add bean and seeds to saucepan. Stir over low heat until sugar dissolves.

Increase heat to high and bring to the boil. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer, uncovered, for 10 minutes or until mixture becomes syrupy. Add peaches, cover and simmer for 10 minutes or until peaches are tender.
Using a slotted spoon, lift peaches out of the syrup and transfer to a bowl. Set aside until cool enough to handle.
Peel off skin and discard. Cut peaches in half and remove stones.

While peaches are cooling, bring syrup back to the boil and boil, without stirring, until you have a golden caramel syrup. Remove from heat and carefully add passionfruit pulp. Be careful as toffee will bubble and spit. Stir until passionfruit is well combined. Set aside.
Place peach halves into serving bowls and pour over some passionfruit syrup over each. Serve with yoghurt.
